30.title: Captain Savage
30.author: Gary Friedrich, Dick Ayers, Syd Shores
notes: SUMMARY: Tarawa, Nov. 1943. Six U.S. Marines steal onto the island and blow up a Japanese ammunition dump.

31.title: Captain Savage
31.author: Gary Friedrich, Dick Ayers, Syd Shores
notes: SUMMARY: Pacific Ocean, World War II. U.S. Marines and a Japanese "samurai squadron" meet on an island 500 miles north of Darwin while investigating a phantom submarine that has been sinking both allied and Japanese ships. The submarine belongs to renegade German Baron Strucker and his private army Hydra.

32.title: Captain Savage
32.author: Gary Friedrich, Dick Ayers, Syd Shores
notes: SUMMARY: Pacific Island, World War II. U.S. Marines and Japanese soldiers are forced to cooperate against a common enemy, Baron Strucker and Hydra.

33.title: Captain Savage
33.author: Gary Friedrich, Dick Ayers, Syd Shores
notes: SUMMARY: Pacific Island, World War II. U.S. Marines and Japanese soldiers cooperate to defeat Baron Strucker and Hydra.
